seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 8+ years of experience in Data Engineering

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and core responsibilities include data pipeline creation

sub_specialty.evidence: Snowflake is mentioned as a key skill, which is a data warehouse technology

leadership_expectation.evidence: No direct evidence of leadership expectations or mentoring responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers or services explicitly mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results

processing_paradigm.evidence: Data pipeline creation is mentioned, but no explicit streaming or real-time tools like Kafka or Flink are referenced. Snowflake is typically used for batch processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 results

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake Database is explicitly mentioned as a required skill

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Cupertino, CA, but no remote work model or restrictions are mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation package or requirement explicitly mentioned; job is based in Cupertino, CA but does not state relocation is required

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned explicitly in Pass 1 results

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No OPT/CPT or student visa signals mentioned

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 results

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Job posting implies full-time employment with a salary range and benefits, which aligns with W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in Pass 1 results or job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth paths or tracks mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 results

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship or coaching signals mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal mobility or role changes mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit career tracks mentioned, though the seniority level suggests potential IC track availability

requirement_strictness.evidence: Must-have skills (SQL, Python, Data pipeline creation) are clearly distinguished from nice-to-have skills (Snowflake, Communication)

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on a single role with well-defined responsibilities in data engineering

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8+ years of experience aligns with senior-level expectations, and required skills are reasonable for the seniority level
